summary: 17 CFR § 230.135 allows issuers or selling security holders to publish notices of proposed registered offerings without being deemed to offer securities for sale, provided the notice includes a disclaimer and limited content. The notice can include basic details about the issuer, securities, timing, and purpose, with additional specifics allowed for rights offerings, employee offerings, exchange offers, and Rule 145(a) offerings. Corrections of inaccuracies are permitted.
